message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects a fair starting point for our negotiations.
Alice, my turn. Let's speed things up.  This offer is more in line with a fair split.
Bob, your offer undervalues my position. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but no further.
Alice, this is getting tedious.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome here. Let's end this.
